body_html:
In addition, even loading both libc.so.6 and ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 doesn't work.

(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# LD_PRELOAD="/opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6 /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2" python ./lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py
Segmentation fault
body_text:
In addition, even loading both libc.so.6 and ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 doesn't work.
(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# LD_PRELOAD="/opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6 /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2" python ./lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py
Segmentation fault
body:
In addition, even loading both libc.so.6 and ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 doesn't work.

```
(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# LD_PRELOAD="/opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6 /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2" python ./lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py
Segmentation fault
```
